title: Image Text Overlay
description: In this lab, we will be learning about image text overlays using CSS. The purpose of this lab is to teach you how to display text on top of an image with an overlay, making it readable regardless of the background image and color. You will learn how to use the backdrop-filter property to apply a blur and brightness effect to your text, creating a professional and visually appealing design.

meta.title: Image Text Overlay: Enhance Readability with CSS Backdrop Filters
meta.description: Learn how to display readable text on top of any image using CSS backdrop filters for a professional, visually appealing design.
meta.keywords: brightness effect, css, web design, css backdrop filter, css practice, css playground, blur effect, css lab, css exercises, image text overlay
